comments.body: In case we have optimizations that make the `TreeTypeMap` and identity function, do we have a test to guard against such optimizations?

We already do that optimization outside `TreeTypeMap`, for example in `changeOwner`.

We do have tests that would fail if this stops cloning the symbols.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +190,194 @@            TreeTypeMap(oldOwners = List(owner), newOwners = List(owner)).apply(tree)
          case _ =>
            tree

      case _ =>
